s: June 4, 2024 - This program can help connect you with IP legal service providers that offer trademark-registration services at competitive rates. Brands who use IP Accelerator also get faster access to Brand Registry benefits, which they can enjoy while their trademark application is pending.

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.

t: Welcome to Amazon Seller Central
s: Log in to your Amazon seller account, or sign up to create a seller account.

t: Register Your Brand with Amazon's Trademark Registration
s: February 24, 2025 - Per your advice, we were brand registered when we discovered that some foreign group had pirated our product and launched 12-16 copycat versions of our product (which we invented & copyrighted). Per your advice, we filed our complaint with Amazon, who took down the pirated listings with 24 hours.
